00022 #include "spindle_control.h"
00023 #include "settings.h"
00024 #include "motion_control.h"
00025 #include "config.h"
00026 #include "planner.h"
00027 #include "stepper.h"
00028 
00029 #include <stdint.h>
00030 
00031 static uint8_t current_direction;
00032 
00033 void spindle_init()
00034 {
00035   current_direction = 0;
00036   // Configure as output pin.
00037   SPINDLE_ENABLE_DDR |= (1<<SPINDLE_ENABLE_BIT);
00038   // Configure as output pin.
00039   SPINDLE_DIRECTION_DDR |= (1<<SPINDLE_DIRECTION_BIT);
00040   spindle_stop();
00041 }
00042 
00043 void spindle_stop()
00044 {
00045 ///---> LETARTARE 16/04/2014
00046 #if SPINDLE_ENABLE_ACTIVE == 1
00047     // Set pin to low to stop.
00048     SPINDLE_ENABLE_PORT &= ~(1<<SPINDLE_ENABLE_BIT);
00049 #else
00050     // Set pin to high to stop.
00051     SPINDLE_ENABLE_PORT |= (1<<SPINDLE_ENABLE_BIT);
00052 #endif
00053 
00054 #if SPINDLE_DIRECTION_ACTIVE == 1
00055         // Set pin to high to run.
00056     SPINDLE_DIRECTION_PORT |= (1<<SPINDLE_DIRECTION_BIT);
00057 #else
00058         // Set pin to low to run.
00059     SPINDLE_DIRECTION_PORT &= ~(1<<SPINDLE_DIRECTION_BIT);
00060 #endif
00061 /// <---
00062 }
00063 
00064 void spindle_run(int8_t direction, uint16_t rpm) 
00065 {
00066   if (direction != current_direction) {
00067     plan_synchronize();
00068     if (direction) {
00069       if(direction > 0) {
00070 ///---> LETARTARE 16/04/2014
00071       #if SPINDLE_DIRECTION_ACTIVE == 1
00072         // Set pin to high to run.
00073         SPINDLE_DIRECTION_PORT |= (1<<SPINDLE_DIRECTION_BIT);
00074       #else
00075         // Set pin to low to run.
00076         SPINDLE_DIRECTION_PORT &= ~(1<<SPINDLE_DIRECTION_BIT);
00077       #endif
00078 ///<---
00079       }
00080       else {
00081 ///---> LETARTARE 16/04/2014
00082       #if SPINDLE_DIRECTION_ACTIVE == 1
00083         // Set pin to low.
00084         SPINDLE_DIRECTION_PORT &= ~(1<<SPINDLE_DIRECTION_BIT);
00085       #else
00086         // Set pin to high.
00087         SPINDLE_DIRECTION_PORT |= (1<<SPINDLE_DIRECTION_BIT);
00088       #endif
00089       }
00090     #if SPINDLE_ENABLE_ACTIVE == 1
00091         // Set pin to high to run.
00092         SPINDLE_ENABLE_PORT |= (1<<SPINDLE_ENABLE_BIT);
00093     #else
00094         // Set pin to low to run.
00095         SPINDLE_ENABLE_PORT &= ~(1<<SPINDLE_ENABLE_BIT);
00096     #endif
00097 ///<---
00098     }
00099     else {
00100       spindle_stop();     
00101     }
00102     current_direction = direction;
00103   }
00104 if (settings.spindle_pwm == 1) {
00105   if (rpm > settings.max_spindle) {
00106     rpm = settings.max_spindle;
00107   }
00108   if (direction == 0) {
00109     rpm = 0;
00110     OCR4A = 0;
00111     TCCR4A = 0; //reset clock values
00112     TCCR4B = 0; //reset clock values
00113   }
00114   else if (rpm > 0 ) {
00115     TCCR4A = 0; //reset clock values
00116     TCCR4B = 0; //reset clock values
00117     TCCR4A = (1<<COM4A1) | (1<<WGM42) | (1<<WGM41) | (1<<WGM40); //10 bit Fast PWM
00118     TCCR4B = (1<<CS41); //set prescaler to 8
00119     OCR4A = rpm / settings.max_spindle * 1023;
00120   }
00121   else {
00122     TCCR4A = 0; //reset clock values
00123     TCCR4B = 0; //reset clock values
00124     TCCR4A = (1<<COM4A1) | (1<<WGM42) | (1<<WGM41) | (1<<WGM40); //10 bit Fast PWM
00125     TCCR4B = (1<<CS41); //set prescaler to 8
00126     OCR4A = settings.default_spindle / settings.max_spindle * 1023;
00127   }
00128 }     
00129 }
